page.title: 10Life Style Marion Kelly
page.content: I got up and got my porridge for breakfast. Then I got dressed. I went to school. When the school bell went I went in. We had to read. Then we went to maths. When we had done maths we went to play. We played IT. The bell went. "Oh no Creative Writing" When we had done Creative Writing we went to the Mobile Library. We had dinner and then dinner play. After that we had to finish the Creative Writing. When we went out to play we played IT again. After the bell we had rounders. This is my Creative Writing.
